subtitle.Text: Karla: So here’s one of dad’s pulpy JFK books, he’s now moved on from primary sources to theories about how JFK was killed, however this one purports to contain the truth.
Yeah the publishing company is a doofy inside joke because, you know, there’s Harcourt Brace, the publisher that exists so I was trying to think of a good name for a publisher and, being a big nerd
I immediately thought of Harcourt Fenton Mudd, and how he basically sounds like a publishing company, so...
Steve: You have to say who that is.
Karla: No! ...alright fine, he’s an awful character from
Karla: ...from original Star Trek! Which is called Mudd’s Women and also there’s another one whose name I can’t remember for some reason-
Karla: Ah, fuck! Yes, okay, thank you.
Steve: It’s a Star Trek reference. You did it, Karla.
